subject: Diana Lokada (@dianalokada)
style: Modern heraldic crest with classical structure but contemporary irreverence. Clean vector-style illustration. Think: if a medieval herald had to design a coat of arms for a chronically online Ukrainian software engineer in NYC who shitposts about men in glasses and drinks too much Celsius.

colors.primary: Deep midnight black — she wears black, she codes in dark mode, her soul is dark mode
colors.secondary: Electric cyan / Celsius teal — the energy drink that runs through her veins
colors.highlight: Soft Ukrainian blue and wheat yellow — subtle nod to the flag, not overt

quarters.element: A crescent moon, tilted — Diana is the Roman goddess of the moon and the hunt. This is the mythological anchor.
quarters.style: Thin elegant linework in gold on black field

quarters.element: A terminal cursor blinking — a simple > or █ prompt symbol, representing code, the command line, building things
quarters.style: Cyan/teal on black, glowing slightly like a screen in a dark room

quarters.element: A Celsius energy drink can, stylized and heraldic — rendered like a classical chalice or goblet but unmistakably a slim energy drink can
quarters.style: Teal and white on gold field, treated with the same reverence as a holy grail

quarters.element: A pair of eyeglasses — her thing for nerds in glasses, the sapiosexual icon
quarters.style: Simple gold wireframe glasses on black field, slightly askew like they were just taken off

center_charge.element: A Ukrainian tryzub (trident) — small, centered where the quarters meet, subtle but present. This is her origin, her backbone.
center_charge.style: Minimal gold linework, not dominant but unmissable

crest.position: Above the shield, atop a torse/wreath
crest.element: A hunting bow crossed with a mechanical keyboard — Diana the huntress meets Diana the engineer. The bow is classical, the keyboard is modern. They form an X.
crest.style: Gold bow, black keyboard with cyan keycap highlights

left.figure: A wolf — loyal, sharp, runs in packs but hunts alone when needed. Eastern European energy. Slightly stylized, not cartoonish.
left.posture: Rampant (standing on hind legs), facing the shield
left.detail: Wearing small wireframe glasses, because of course

right.figure: A raven — intelligence, shitposting from above, sees everything, chronically observing
right.posture: Wings partially spread, perched on a stack of code blocks or terminal windows
right.detail: Holding a single wheat stalk in its beak — Ukraine

motto_banner.style: All caps, clean serif font, gold text on black ribbon
alternate_options: BIG BRAIN BIG BUTT GODDESS ENERGY

background.element: None — the crest should stand alone on a clean background, suitable for use as a logo or avatar
background.optional: Faint radial glow behind the shield in cyan, like a monitor's light in a dark room

overall_notes: The tone should be 70% classical heraldry, 30% absurd internet energy
Every element should feel like it belongs on a medieval banner AND on a Twitter profile
Color palette stays tight: black, cyan/teal, gold, with touches of blue and yellow
Clean lines, no excessive detail — this should work at small sizes too
The vibe is: a goddess of the modern internet, patron saint of nerds and shitposters, who happens to be a real engineer from Ukraine living in New York
It should feel powerful and a little bit funny at the same time — like her
